Joke Silva, MFR (amụrụ 29 Septemba 1961) bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, onye ntụzi na ọchụnta ego.
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos na Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art na London, Joke Silva malitere ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri na mbido 1990
Na 1998 ọ nwere nnukwu ọrụ, na-esepụta n'ihu Colin Firth na Nia Long na ihe nkiri British-Canadian The Secret Laughter of Women

N'afọ 2006, o meriri "Best Actress in a Lead Role" na 2nd Africa Movie Academy Awards maka arụmọrụ ya na Women's cot, yana " Best Actress in a Support Role " na 4th Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2008 maka arụmọrụ ya dịka nne nne na White Waters
Joke Silva lụrụ onye omee Olu Jacobs
Di na nwunye ahụ hiwere ma rụọ ọrụ Lufodo Group, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke mejupụtara ihe nkiri, akụ nkesa na Lufodo Academy nke nka a na ekiri ekiri
Joke Silva bụ onye isi ihe ọmụmụ na ngwụcha a
Joke Silva bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa  nke Malete Film Village, nwere njikọ na Mahadum Kwara State
Na 29 Septemba 2014, a nabatara Joke Silva dị ka onye so na Order nke Federal Republic, otu n'ime nsọpụrụ mba Nigeria, na International Conference Center dị n'Abuja
A mụrụ Joke Silva na Lagos n'ime ezinụlọ Amaro nwere ụmụ anọ
Nne ya, Adebimbola Silva, dọkịta ọsụ ụzọ, nwụrụ na Juli 2015
Nna ya, Emmanuel Afolabi Silva bụ onye ọkaiwu
Joke Silva gara Holy Child College dị na Lagos
Na mahadum ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu ọdịbendị nke gụnyere onye na -ede egwuregwu Bode Osanyin na onye ọbụ abụ Stella Monye
Joke Silva wepụrụ Ofú afọ agụmakwụkwọ ya, oge ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri
Silva kwagara England, na -amụ ihe nkiri na Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art na London
Na mbido, nne na nna ya na -emegide mkpebi Silva ka ọ banye n'ụlọ ihe nkiri mana n'oge na -adịghị anya ha malitere ịkwado ya, na -enwe obi ụtọ maka ihe ịga nke ọma ọ rụrụ n'ọrụ ya
N'ime obere oge ọ na -arụ ọrụ, ọ laghachiri ụlọ akwụkwọ, na -amụ Bekee na Mahadum Lagos
Joke Silva emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro onyonyo n'asụsụ Bekee na Yoruba
Otu n'ime ọrụ izizi ya bụ na ihe nkiri Bekee nke 1990 Mind Bending
Na 1993 ọ pụtara na Owulorojo, sochiri Violated na1995
N'afọ 1998, ọ pụtara n'ihu Colin Firth na Nia Long na ihe nkiri Britain-Canada Ihe ọchị nke ụmụ nwanyị, nke ọ kọwara Nene n'ime ya
Onye edemede Finola Kerrigan kwuru karịa Silva pụtara dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri pụrụiche na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa mgbe o kwuru ọrụ ya
Na 2002, Joke Silva pụtara n'ihu Bimbo Akintola na Keeping Faith
Akintola mechara rụtụ aka na Silva, onye ọ na -akpọ "Aunty Joke", dị ka nnukwu mmetụta ọrụ, na -agbakwụnye, "Silva emeela ọtụtụ ihe, mana ọbụghị maka ihe ndị o mere, ọ bụ maka ihe ndị ọ maghị
na ọ mere "
Ọzọkwa na 2002, Silva rụkọrọ ọrụ na gosiputa na The Kingmaker ya na Olu Jacobs
Nke a sochiri ọrụ na foto A Husband's Wife (2003), Shylock (2004), na Ochie Kpọrọ Kpọrọ (2004)
N'afọ 2006, e nyere Joke Silva ihe nrite "Best Actress in a Leading Role" na 2nd Africa Movie Academy Awards maka ọrụ ya na akwa akwa ụmụ nwanyị
Ka emechara n'afọ ahụ, Silva pụtara n'ihu Genevieve Nnaji na Mildred Okwo gosiputara na ihe nkiri 30 Days, nke nwetara nhọpụta 10 na Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2008
Ọ kọkwara mmepụta Anglo-Nigerian nke Jeta Amata bụ Amazing Grace,  nke emere na Calabar
Ndị nkatọ jara ihe nkiri ahụ mma, wee họpụta ya maka nturu ugo 11 African Movie Academy Awards
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kwuru “olu Silva dị ka abụ, [nke] na-enye nghọta maka omume”)
N'afọ 2007, Joke Silva pụtara n'ihu Kate Henshaw-Nuttal, Michael Okon na Fred Essien na Ndubuisi Okoh's To Love and to Hold
Silva meriri nturu ugo onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2008  maka '' ngosipụta nne ya '' na White Waters (2007), n'agbanyeghị na ọ nọghị n'ememe ịnata onyinye ya n'onwe ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ November 2008, Joke Silva kwupụtara na "oge ọ bụla ọ ga -eme ihe ọjọọ na fim, na ọ ga -ekpe ekpere wee jiri Jizọs mere 'ogige' ya
Silva bụkwa onye nwetara EMOTAN Award site na African Independent Television (AIT) na SOLIDRA Award nke Visual Art

In 2011, Joke Silva gosiputara ya na Nse Ikpe Etim, Wale Ojo naLydia Forson n'imeKunle Afolayan's ihe ọchị ihunanya Phone Swap. Ndị nkatọ toro ya, na otu n'ime ihe nkiri kacha atụ anya n'afọọ nwetara nhọpụta anọ na nturu ugo 8th Africa Movie Academy Awards, gụnyere nhọpụta maka Best Nigerian Film
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite maka Mmezu na nhazi Mmepụta
. N'afọ 2013, Silva gara n'ihu ka ọ pụta na Thespian Family Theatre na Mmepụta ihe nkiri "Mad King of Ijudiya" na Agip Hall nke Muson Center nke Lagos na ekeresimesi

Emere ihe ngosi abụọ n'elekere atọ nke ehihie na elekere ịsị mgbede na 21, 22, 28 na 29 Disemba, nke Vanguard kọwara dị ka "ngwakọta bara ụba nke akụkọ ọdịnala, ịgba egwu ọdịnala na egwu na -ebuga ndị na -ege ntị na ọnọdụ ime obodo Africa..
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2012, ụlọ ọrụ United Nations na -ahụ maka ọgwụ ọjọọ na mpụ họpụtara Joke Silva onye nnọchi anya
Dika iwu UN siri tinye ndị a ma ama na nka, egwu, ihe nkiri, egwuregwu na akwụkwọ iji nyere aka na mkpọsa ha, ọrụ Joke Silva lekwasịrị anya na isonye na ọgụ megide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na Naịjirịa
Ọrụ na -alụ ọgụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ bụ akụkụ nke mkpọsa "I Am Priceless" mgbasa Ozi, nke nwetakwara nkwado n'aka ndị ọchịchị Naịjirịa
Nhọpụta Silva bụ maka oge afọ atọ
Joke Silva lụrụ onye omere nka bụ Olu Jacobs ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Di na nwunye ahụ zutere na 1981 na National Theatre, Lagos n'oge ncheta nnwere onwe nke iri abụọ na otu

Joke Silva bụ onye isi ihe ọmụmụ na Lufodo Academy of Performing Arts, ebe di ya na -elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ. Lufodo Academy bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ akụ di na nwunye nwere dịka akụkụ nke Lufodo Group, gụnyere Lufodo Productions, Lufodo Nyocha, N'nkesa Lufodo

Joke Silva akwadebela maka Bank of Industry (BOI) na Ihe nkiri na gosiri mgbe omere, Ihe nkiri, Edetu n'kwụkwọ na Uri na 2012 London Olympics, ma bụrụkwa onye isi nchịkwa ọsụ ụzọ nke Malete Film Village, ya na mahadum Kwara State
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri, Joke Silva bụ onye na -eme ebere na onye nkwado siri ike maka nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị na ike, na -enye aka na agụmakwụkwọ ha, ọzụzụ na ọganihu ha
Na 29 Septemba 2014, a kwanyere Joke Silva ugwu dịka onye otu Order nke Federal Republic, otu n'ime nsọpụrụ mba Naijiria, na International Conference Center dị n'Abuja
Na Septemba 2016, ekpughere ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara maka AIICO Pension Managers Limited (APML)
Joke Silva, n'ime afọ 2020, na -eduzi mkpọsa ahụ megide ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na -arịa ọrịa na -arịọ maka ego iji kwụọ ụgwọ ọgwụ ha
Joke Silva mere nke ahụ site na ihe atụ nke ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Guild nke Nigeria, AGN, nke kpughere atụmatụ ịmalite mkpuchi ahụike maka ndị otu ya
